Description:
Detects the stopping of a Windows service via the PowerShell Cmdlet "Stop-Service"

Author: Jakob Weinzettl, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Stop Windows Service Via PowerShell Stop-Service
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll') and (process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe')) and command like '%stop-service %')
